migrations.description: Convert jest.config.ts files from ESM to CJS syntax (export default -> module.exports, import -> require) for projects using CommonJS resolution to ensure correct loading under Node.js type-stripping.
migrations.name: convert-jest-config-to-cjs

migrations.description: Replace removed matcher aliases in Jest v30 with their corresponding matcher
migrations.name: replace-removed-matcher-aliases-v22-3

migrations.description: Updates webpack-based SSR configuration to use preserve module format and bundler module resolution.
migrations.name: update-ssr-webpack-config-22-2-0

migrations.description: Update 'module' to 'preserve' and 'moduleResolution' to 'bundler' in TypeScript configurations for Angular projects.
migrations.name: update-module-resolution-22-2-0

migrations.description: Updates the 'lib' property in tsconfig files to use 'es2022' or a more modern version.
migrations.name: update-typescript-lib-22-2-0

migrations.description: Update 'vitest' unit test runner option to 'vitest-analog' in generator defaults.
migrations.name: update-unit-test-runner-option

migrations.description: Set 'isolatedModules' to 'true' in TypeScript test configurations for Angular projects.
migrations.name: set-isolated-modules-22-3-0

migrations.description: Replace 'jest-preset-angular/setup-jest' imports with the new 'setupZoneTestEnv' function.
migrations.name: update-jest-preset-angular-setup
